name: tvplus-contentslide
description: This extension allows you to inherit the content of a TemplaVoilaPlus content element column to its child pages - Adaption of EXT:kb_tv_cont_slide to work with templavoilaplus
author: j.peter.m.schuler@uni-due.de

scripts.develop: npm run test && npm run version:prerelease && ./.deploy.sh
scripts.version:copy: npm run version:copy:package.json:composer.json && npm run version:copy:package.json:ext_emconf.php && npm run version:copy:package.json:docsettings
scripts.version:copy:package.json:ext_emconf.php: node -e "var fs = require('fs');var contents = fs.readFileSync('ext_emconf.php', 'utf8');contents=contents.replace(/'version' => '[^']+',/g,'\'version\' => \''+require('./package.json').version+'\',');fs.writeFile('./ext_emconf.php',contents,function (err) {});" && phplint -s ext_emconf.php
scripts.version:copy:package.json:composer.json: node -e "var fs = require('fs');var file = require('./composer.json'); file.version='v'+ require('./package.json').version; fs.writeFile('./composer.json',JSON.stringify(file),function (err) {});" && jsonlint -i  ./composer.json
scripts.lint: npm run lint:phplint && npm run lint:jsonlint
